title: 除op以外的玩家为什么放置不了TNT？
author: lqx123

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
lqx123 发表于 2014-7-11 16:47
怎么改啊
修改 .\plugins\essentials\config.yml
  blacklist:

    # 阻止玩家放置以下方块
  # 10 = 动态岩浆 :: 11 = 静态岩浆 :: 46 = TNT :: 327 = 岩浆桶
    placement: 10,11,46,327

replies.author: lqx123
replies.txt_content:
